EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Tasktop - APAC - 2015.09.24.Email - Follow Up - Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending Leveraging the Power of Tosca Connect and Tasktop Sync
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Leveraging the Power of Tosca Connect and Tasktop Sync
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for attending our webinar, Leveraging the Power of Tosca Connect and Tasktop Sync! We hope you found the webinar informative and helpful.
Click here <http://www.tricentis.com/resources> for a recording of this and other webinars.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>. Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Gernot Brandl Product Manager Tricentis
Michael Jahn Tasktop
